conflicts.description: sbcl: Cannot build with gcc on darwin because pthreads will fail to link
conflicts.name: %gcc+fancy

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Steel Bank Common Lisp (SBCL) is a high performance Common Lisp
compiler. It is open source / free software, with a permissive license.
In addition to the compiler and runtime system for ANSI Common Lisp, it
provides an interactive environment including a debugger, a statistical
profiler, a code coverage tool, and many other extensions.
dependencies.name: sbcl-bootstrap

dependencies.description:
Zstandard, or zstd as short version, is a fast lossless compression
algorithm, targeting real-time compression scenarios at zlib-level and
better compression ratios.
dependencies.name: zstd

description:
Steel Bank Common Lisp (SBCL) is a high performance Common Lisp
compiler. It is open source / free software, with a permissive license.
In addition to the compiler and runtime system for ANSI Common Lisp, it
provides an interactive environment including a debugger, a statistical
profiler, a code coverage tool, and many other extensions.
name: sbcl

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Enable extra features like compression and threading.
variants.name: fancy
